items.title: The Best Warren Buffett Stock to Invest $500 in Right Now
items.description: American Express is one of Berkshire Hathaway's largest holdings and has been a part of its portfolio for over three decades.  The credit card company has carved a niche by focusing on affluent consumers and operating a closed-loop payment system.  The consumer lending segment faces risks from economic fluctuations, which could affect American Express's transaction volumes and earnings.
